## KinematicPositionRigidBodyOptions interface

The options for a kinematic position rigid body.

Use for: moving bodies by setting target positions each tick. Do NOT use for: physics-driven motion; use dynamic bodies instead.

\*\*Category:\*\* Physics

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface KinematicPositionRigidBodyOptions extends BaseRigidBodyOptions 
```
**Extends:** [BaseRigidBodyOptions](./server.baserigidbodyoptions.md)
